hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Shadow Temple#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #King Dodongo# holds...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #a Deku Stick#.
hinted_locations: Deku Tree Slingshot Room Side Chest

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Strength Upgrade#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that ##the Graveyard## has #1# major item.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that ##the Water Temple## has #3# major items.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path of #time#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #a Slingshot# can be found in #Goron City#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #northern basement of the Water Temple# contains...^ #a Goron Tunic# and #a Red Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Water Temple GS Near Boss Key Chest

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Strength Upgrade#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Red Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #20 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Spirit Temple#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that a #fairy outside Hyrule Castle# holds #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the path to the #Shadow Medallion#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Gerudo Training Ground#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: Medigoron sells the earliest Breath of the Wild demo.
